bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for the Preparation of Test Procedures for the Thermal Evaluation of Solid Electrical Insulating Materials
IEEE Standard for the Preparation of Test Procedures for the Thermal Evaluation of Solid Electrical Insulating Materials

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Reaffirmed September 2007. Principles for the development of test procedures to evaluate the thermal endurance of solid electrical insulating materials in air are given in this standard.
Principles for the development of test procedures to evaluate the thermal endurance of solid electrical insulating materials in air are given in this standard.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
